BoolField¶

class decodes.core.dc_color.BoolField(pixel_res=ival[20.0,20.0], initial_value=False, ic=False, wrap=True)¶

Bases: decodes.core.dc_color.PixelGrid

a raster grid of boolean values each pixel contains a True or a False

__init__(pixel_res=ival[20.0,20.0], initial_value=False, ic=False, wrap=True)¶

BoolField constructor.

Parameters:
  • pixel_res (Interval) – Resolution of BoolField.
  • initial_value (bool) – Start value of BoolField
  • ic (bool) – Include corners parameter.
  • wrap (bool) – Boolean value.
Result :

BoolField object.
Return type:

BoolField
to_image(false_color=color[1.0,1.0,1.0], true_color=color[0.0,0.0,0.0])¶

Constructs and image from the BoolField.

Parameters:
  • false_color (Color) – Color for False values.
  • true_color (Color) – Color for True values.
Result :

Image
Return type:

Image
